msg: GERONIMO-6348: Ability to configure XSRF filter with resource paths that should be ignored during XSRF check.

msg: Fix busy-loop in current section determiner

author: eli
msg: HDFS-3230. Cleanup DatanodeID creation in the tests. Contributed by Eli Collins

author: markt
msg: Fix a problem whereby if the poller was under low but consistent load (>1 request/per second and always less than 1s between requests) timeouts never took place.
After the change, timeouts will be processed every X seconds where pollerTimeout <= X <= (timoutInterval + pollerTimeout + time taken to process timeouts)
Note the default values for pollerTimeout and timeoutInterval are 1000ms
